context: West is one of the best-selling artists of all time, having sold more than <a0_0><a3_0><a5_0><a7_0>3<a7_0/><a3_0/>2 million<a5_0/><a0_0/> albums and <a1_0>100 million<a1_0/> digital downloads worldwide. Three of his albums rank on Rolling Stone's 2012 "500 Greatest Albums of All <a4_0>Time<a4_0/>" list; two of his albums feature at first and eighth, respectively, in Pitchfork Media's The 100 Best Albums of 2010–2014.
